audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - “The Right To Be Inspired" ;“That Co-Essential Second Touch” - 1949 September 17, 1950 October 29, [Undated], 1951 Spring

audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Side 1] : [Dr. Crane], “The Right To Be Inspired", “That Co-Essential Second Touch” : Recording of sermons: Track 1 September 17, 1949 “The Right To Be Inspired" ; October 29, 1950 “That Co-Essential Second Touch” ; Track 2 “United Nations” ; Easter 1951, “The Ultimate Victory.”

[Side 2] : [Dr. Crane], “United Nations”, “The Ultimate Victory” : Recording of sermons: Track 1 September 17, 1949 “The Right To Be Inspired" ; October 29, 1950 “That Co-Essential Second Touch” ; Track 2 “United Nations” ; Easter 1951, “The Ultimate Victory.”
